text: Jack Drees (1917-1988) was sportscaster. His jobs include these: *Boxing on CBS play-by-play *St. Louis Football Cardinals on CBS play-by-play *NFL on CBS play-by-play *NFL on CBS Radio play-by-play *College Football on CBS play-by- play *Thoroughbred Racing on CBS Host/race caller *PGA Tour on CBS play-by- play *Chicago Cubs play-by-play *Chicago White Sox play-by-play *College Football on ABC play-by-play *Chicago Bulls play-by-play *College Basketball on ABC play-by-play *Chicago Bears play-by-play *Sports Unlimited Host *High School Basketball on WGN-TV play-by-play Category:1917 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Golf broadcasters Category:Horse Racing broadcasters Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:Journalists from Chicago
title: Jack Drees
